Baseus Zinc Alloy Nylon Braided USB-C cable

Buy for $4 (Reg. $8)

Enter promo code CUEQ2RMV during checkout.

What we love

This 3.3-foot Baseus USB-C cable is a solid upgrade if you’re tired of flimsy cords that fray after a few months. It uses a nylon-braided exterior with zinc alloy connector housings for added durability. This cable is also pretty good when it comes to the overall performance as it’s capable of delivering up to 100W of power and supporting data transfer speeds up to 480MB/s.

Discounts on this 14-inch model have been few and far between since its debut, and it only saw its first big markdown earlier this month as part of a very limited Deals of the Day offer. Today’s deal lands it within just $50 of that price, making this a great time to cash in and snag one if you’re in the market for a new laptop. items.title: EcoFlow flash savings drops DELTA 3 Max power station back at second-best $749 (Reg. $1,199), more from $399

As part of its ongoing Disaster Winter Storm Sale, EcoFlow has launched another 48-hour flash sale that will continue through tomorrow, January 21, with up to 62% discounts on four offers – two being add-on accessory bundles and two being power stations. One notable price drop is the DELTA 3 Max Portable Power Station that is now back at $749 shipped, matching its Amazon pricing. Starting from $1,499 here and $1,199 at Amazon, we saw this same rate appear last week in a similar flash sale, with the price otherwise having been kept at $799 lately at Amazon. You’re getting another chance at the second-best price while these short-term savings last, saving you $450 off the going rate and $750 off the MSRP, which is only beaten out by the $699 low last seen during Cyber Monday. Head below to learn more about it and see the three other flash offers while they’re still around.
